main event: On October 9, 1960, a single unidentified object was observed east of Misawa Air Base in Japan.
interesting points: The object was initially suspected to be a meteorological balloon based on observations., Witnesses reported an explosive type flash associated with the sighting., Observations were complicated by the object's radiant color against the twilight sky., The size of the object was difficult to determine due to normal challenges in assessing light sources., There were no other confirmed witnesses to the sighting.
witness description: military personnel at Misawa Air Base
